Behind the Scenes of Food Wars!

With Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma in its fourth season (or rather plate!), the Crunchyroll video team went to Japan to take a closer look at the making-of process of the hit culinary series. Check out our exclusive documentary now!
 

Crunchyroll and VIZ Media Europe Group

Crunchyroll and VIZ Media Europe Group have come together, with Crunchyroll now officially the majority owner of VIZ Media Europe Group.

Top Anime of the Decade by the Numbers

Check out our deep dive into the trends of our Top Anime of the Decade list, looking at best year, studio, genre, and most common source material!
 

KILL la KILL Slices Through December

Team up with Lady Satsuki, Ryuko, and Mako as they explore the toughest dungeons in Grand Summoners. Event ends early January so play it before the holidays end.

Best Anime Figures from Mega Hobby Expo

Our Japan correspondent Daryl went to the Mega Hobby Expo Autumn 2019 event to get a first-hand look at all the best anime figures coming out in 2020!
